it.polimi.se2018.controller.network.server

Interface RMIServerInt

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote

    public interface RMIServerInt
extends java.rmi.Remote
    The RMI login interface
    Author:
    Francesco Franzini

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String delete(java.lang.String usn, java.lang.String pw)
      Attempts to delete a user
      RMISession login(java.lang.String usn, java.lang.String pw, boolean isRecover, boolean register)
      Attempts a login with the given parameters

    • Method Detail

      • login

        RMISession login(java.lang.String usn,
                 java.lang.String pw,
                 boolean isRecover,
                 boolean register)
          throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Attempts a login with the given parameters
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        pw - password
        isRecover - flag to indicate that this is a connection recovery
        register - flag to indicate that this is a new user
        Returns:
        an Object describing the result
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an I/O error occurs

      • delete

        java.lang.String delete(java.lang.String usn,
                        java.lang.String pw)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Attempts to delete a user
        Parameters:
        usn - username
        pw - password
        Returns:
        a textual representation of the outcome
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - if an I/O error occurs
